item.title: 对冲基金连续第四周减持中国股票 深证成指乐观情绪消退
item.description: 高盛（Goldman Sachs）的一份报告显示，随着低成本人工智能初创公司深鉴科技（DeepSeek）点燃的对中国科技股的热情开始消退，全球对冲基金连续四周继续抛售中国股票。【原文：Global hedge funds continued to sell China equities for a fourth straight week as the renewed enthusiasm for Chinese tech stocks, ignited by low-cost artificial intelligence startup DeepSeek, began to fade, a Goldman Sachs note showed.】

item.title: Downdetector 显示，数以千计的用户的社交媒体平台 X 出现故障
item.description: 据停电跟踪网站 Downdetector.com 称，美国和英国有数千名用户的社交媒体平台 X 出现故障。【原文：Social media platform X is down for thousands of users in the U.S. and the UK, according to outage tracking website Downdetector.com.】

item.title: 特朗普冻结美国农业部开支，农民搁置计划和投资
item.description: 蒙大拿州贝尔格莱德外的有机农场主 Nate Powell-Palm 依靠美国农业部农业营销服务部提供的 64.8 万美元赠款，帮助建立了一家饲料厂，这是该地区约 150 名有机谷物农场主的经济命脉。【原文：Nate Powell-Palm, an organic farmer outside Belgrade, Montana, was relying on a $648,000 grant from USDA's Agricultural Marketing Service to help build a feed mill - an economic lifeline for about 150 area organic grain farmers.】

item.title: 欧洲在扣押俄罗斯资产问题上面临严峻抉择
item.description: 在瞬息万变的全球经济中，欧元作为储备货币的地位面临着日益严峻的挑战，目前，欧洲各国政府在权衡可能扣押俄罗斯被冻结资产所带来的影响时，暂时没有采取任何行动。【原文：Growing challenges to the euro's status as a reserve currency in a fast-changing global economy are, for now, staying the hand of European capitals as they weigh up the repercussions of a potential seizure of frozen Russian assets.】

item.title: 洞察力：特斯拉的股价多年来一直无视地心引力。埃隆-马斯克的电动汽车派对结束了吗？
item.description: 特斯拉的股价在三个月内下跌了近一半。即便如此，投资者仍在争论埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的电动汽车制造商是否仍然定价过高。【原文：Tesla’s stock has dropped by nearly half in three months. Even so, investors are still debating whether Elon Musk's electric-vehicle maker remains overpriced.】

item.title: 利物浦与阿迪达斯签订多年合约，取代耐克
item.description: 据英国媒体报道，利物浦已与阿迪达斯签订了一份多年期的球衣协议，从下赛季开始，阿迪达斯将取代运动服制造商耐克，协议为期五年，每年价值超过 6000 万英镑（约合 7736 万美元）。【原文：Liverpool have signed a multi-year kit deal with Adidas beginning next season that will replace sportswear manufacturer Nike, in what British media reports say is a five-year agreement worth more than 60 million pounds ($77.36 million) per year.】

item.title: 日本牧野铣削公司称收到的收购报价与日本电产不相上下
item.description: 日本牧野铣床公司（Makino Milling Machine）周一表示，该公司已收到具有法律约束力的第三方收购建议书，可与日本电产主动提出的收购要约相媲美。【原文：Japan's Makino Milling Machine said on Monday it has received legally binding third-party proposals for acquisition that rival an unsolicited buyout offer from Nidec .】

item.title: 据英国《金融时报》报道，福特将向德国业务注资 47.6 亿美元
item.description: 据英国《金融时报》周一报道，福特汽车公司将向其陷入困境的德国分公司注资多达 44 亿欧元（47.6 亿美元），以重振其在欧洲的汽车业务。【原文：Ford Motor will inject up to EUR 4.4 billion ($4.76 billion) into its struggling German unit as it tries to revive its car business in Europe, the Financial Times reported on Monday.】

item.title: 因美国调查风险，惠誉给予印度阿达尼能源公司负面展望
item.description: 惠誉国际评级公司（Fitch Ratings）将印度能源基础设施公司阿达尼能源解决方案有限公司（Adani Energy Solutions Limited）的评级展望定为负面，理由是对公司治理和美国正在进行的调查所带来的潜在风险表示担忧。【原文：Fitch Ratings has assigned a negative outlook to Indian energy infrastructure company Adani Energy Solutions Limited , citing concerns over corporate governance and potential risks from ongoing U.S. investigations.】

item.title: 2025 年前两个月中国汽车销量增长 1.3
item.description: 2025 年前两个月，中国汽车销量同比增长 1.3%，原因是扩大用户补贴计划刺激了汽车需求，同时一场新的智能电动汽车价格战正在展开。【原文：China's car sales inched up 1.3% in the first two months of 2025 from the same period a year earlier, as an expanded customer subsidy programme spurred auto demand while a new smart electric vehicle price war unfolds.】

item.title: 中国 Full Truck 联盟高管表示，希望在香港上市，并在 2025 年实现强劲增长
item.description: 中国 "卡车优步"（Uber for trucks）的全车联盟（Full Truck Alliance，FTA）一位高管表示，随着投资者情绪的回升和中美地缘政治紧张局势的升级，该公司可能会重新考虑在香港第二次上市的计划。【原文：Full Truck Alliance (FTA) , China's "Uber for trucks", could revisit plans for a second listing in Hong Kong in the wake of a rebound in investor sentiment and an escalation in Sino-U.S. geopolitical tensions, a company executive said.】

item.title: 中国称对与其有关的船舶收费不会振兴美国工业
item.description: 中国外交部周一表示，美国对与中国有联系的船只征收费用的计划将损害全球供应链和产业链，并损害美国公司的利益。【原文：A plan by the United States to levy fees on China-linked ships will hurt global supply and industrial chains and undermine the interests of U.S. companies, China's foreign ministry said on Monday.】

item.title: 富士康推出首款大型语言机型
item.description: 台湾富士康周一表示，该公司已推出首款大型语言模型，并计划利用该技术改进生产和供应链管理。【原文：Taiwan’s Foxconn said on Monday it has launched its first large language model and plans to use the technology to improve manufacturing and supply chain management.】

item.title: 富士康推出首款大型语言机型

item.title: 德国工业生产增长，但出口下降
item.description: 德国 1 月份的工业产值有所增长，但出口却大幅下滑，这表明欧元区最大经济体的前景依然不容乐观。【原文：German industrial output rose in January but exports plunged, suggesting the outlook for the euro zone's largest economy remains anything but rosy.】

item.title: 大众汽车公司的特拉顿公司认为 2025 年卡车市场将不温不火
item.description: 在欧洲，尤其是德国的持续疲软拖累了大众去年的业绩之后，大众的卡车部门Traton周一预计2025年的商用车市场将不温不火。【原文：Volkswagen's truck unit Traton guided for a tepid commercial vehicle market for 2025 on Monday after persistent weakness in Europe, particularly in Germany, weighed on its results last year.】

item.title: 摩根大通加入高盛集团，上调欧元区 2025 年经济增长预期
item.description: 摩根大通（J.P.Morgan）与华尔街同行高盛（Goldman Sachs）共同预测，在德国财政宽松改革的支持下，欧元区 2025 年的经济增长将得到推动。【原文：J.P.Morgan joined Wall-Street peer Goldman Sachs to forecast a boost to the euro area's economic growth for 2025 on the back of Germany's fiscal loosening reforms.】

item.title: 早间竞标特朗普关税引发衰退红旗
item.description: 凯文-巴克兰对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Kevin Buckland】

item.title: 亚航所有者 Capital A 称 2.26 亿美元私募 "已完成
item.description: 亚航集团首席执行官托尼-费尔南德斯（Tony Fernandes）周一表示，廉价航空公司亚航（AirAsia）的所有者马来西亚 Capital A 公司私募融资 10 亿林吉特（约合 2.26 亿美元）的计划已经 "完成"，公司即将完成重组计划。【原文：A private placement to raise 1 billion ringgit ($226 million) by Malaysia's Capital A , owner of budget airline AirAsia, was "done", Group CEO Tony Fernandes said on Monday, as the company edges closer to completing a reorganisation plan.】

item.title: 西班牙银行 BBVA 将提供比特币和以太币交易服务
item.description: 西班牙银行 BBVA 周一表示，已获得西班牙证券监管机构的批准，可以在西班牙提供比特币和以太币交易服务。【原文：Spanish bank BBVA said on Monday it received approval from the country's securities regulator to offer bitcoin and ether trading services in Spain.】

item.title: 中国顶尖大学扩大招生，加强人工智能和战略领域的能力
item.description: 中国的几所顶尖大学宣布了扩大本科生招生规模的计划，以优先满足他们所谓的 "国家战略需求"，并培养人工智能（AI）等领域的人才。【原文：Several of China's top universities have announced plans to expand their undergraduate enrolment to prioritise what they called "national strategic needs" and develop talent in areas such as artificial intelligence (AI).】

item.title: 明星娱乐公司：洗钱索赔岌岌可危
item.description: 澳大利亚陷入困境的赌场运营商 Star Entertainment 收到了美国赌场集团百利（Bally's）2.5 亿澳元（1.58 亿美元）的收购要约，收购价仅为其一半以上的股份。【原文：Australia's beleaguered casino operator Star Entertainment has received an offer of A$250 million ($158 million) from U.S. casino group Bally's for just over half of its shares, as the debt-laden casino operator reviews options to stay afloat.】

item.title: 日本经常账户两年来首次出现赤字
item.description: 日本财政部周一的数据显示，由于日元疲软抬高了进口成本，日本 1 月份经常账户两年来首次出现赤字。【原文：Japan recorded a current account deficit in January for the first time in two years as a weak yen inflated the cost of imports, finance ministry data showed on Monday.】

item.title: 本周伊始，美元走软，因关税影响，日元上涨
item.description: 由于美国劳动力市场可能疲软，美元在上周大幅下挫后，周一开始走弱，而对全球贸易战的担忧导致投资者转向避险天堂，日元和瑞士法郎也随之走高。【原文：The dollar began Monday on a weak note after significant losses last week due to a potentially weakening U.S. labour market, while concerns over a global trade war led investors to safe havens, lifting the yen and the Swiss franc.】

item.title: Seven & i 与 Couche-Tard 就合并交易的商店销售问题进行谈判
item.description: 日本 Seven & i 控股公司周一表示，已开始与加拿大 Alimentation Couche-Tard 公司（ACT）就商店出售计划进行谈判，该计划将为后者 470 亿美元的收购要约奠定基础。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings said on Monday that talks have begun with Canada's Alimentation Couche-Tard (ACT) over a store sale plan that would set the stage for the latter's $47 billion takeover bid.】

item.title: 投资者继续担心关税影响，油价下跌
item.description: 由于担心美国进口关税对全球经济增长和燃料需求的影响，以及欧佩克+产油国产量的增加，投资者对风险资产的偏好降温，周一油价下跌。【原文：Oil prices fell on Monday as concern about the impact of U.S. import tariffs on global economic growth and fuel demand, as well as rising output from OPEC+ producers, cooled investor appetite for riskier assets.】

item.title: 特朗普称美国正就出售 TikTok 事宜与四家不同集团商谈
item.description: 前洛杉矶道奇队老板弗兰克-麦考特表示了兴趣。【原文：Former LA Dodgers owner Frank McCourt has expressed interest.】

item.title: 受中国通缩压力和贸易战影响，美股期货下挫，日元上涨
item.description: 周一早盘，华尔街期货下挫，避险货币日元走强，原因是中国通货紧缩压力加大，加上美国经济增长乏力，全球贸易战一触即发。【原文：Wall Street futures sank and the safe-haven yen strengthened early on Monday as building deflationary pressures in China added to growth worries from a fading U.S. economy and a simmering global trade war.】

item.title: 日本 1 月实际工资下降，春季工资谈判成焦点
item.description: 周一的数据显示，日本的实际工资在连续两个月小幅增长后，于 1 月份出现下降，而此时距离日本各大企业每年春季举行的一轮薪酬谈判达到高潮还有几天时间。【原文：Japan's real wages fell in January after two months of slight gains, data showed on Monday, days before the annual rounds of pay negotiations held each spring culminate at the country's major firms.】
